deprecated_yaml.title: The SMTP YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring SMTP using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the SMTP YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

The imported recipient key will be removed in the future. Ensure that you update your scripts and automations to set the recipients as targets.
